1.content: Which series do you want to start with?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: Ah yes, the Spyro series that started it all; the Classic Spyro series! So, which character you want to start off with first?
11.title: Classic Spyro

111.content:
The main purple dragon, Spyro, himself. Here is a few stories that you can choose from.

Choice 1 (weight gain): After tricking the elder gaurdians into releasing and sizing him back to normal, Red flees to the mountains where he has constructed an insidious plot; to fatten up Spyro with magic. With him out of the way, he can rule the Dragon Realms.

Choice 2 (inflation): A strange fruit-trees has been sprouting up around Avalar, bearing strange fruit.

Choice 3 (transformation): After suffering yet another defeat from the purple hero, Ripto decides to rid himself from Spyro forever. He constructs a machine that would change anyone that would be hit by it.
111.title: Spyro

1111.content: Do you really want to stick with this story or choose another story?
1111.title: Revenge is fattening.

11111.content:
The snow and wind swirled the moantian tips, howling at the world with all its fury. In between all the chaos, a cave entrence stood solidly against the face of a cliff. Inside a red figure skalcked around, grumbling to himself.

Cluching his staff tightly, he fussed of a few magic scrolls sprawled out in front of him. His eyes narrowed. "Hmm, a pioson spell might be good, but a shrinking one sounds well enough too."

He continued to search the scroll, determind to find a proper spell that was simple but yet effective to use. When the first parchesment proved useless, he threw it aside. He grumbled further to himself, thinking of the time he first escaped Avalar.

It was at least a week ago. His glass jar prison offered him much time to ponder, constructing a plan to escape. He tricked the elder to release him by proving he was good. They sized him back to normale, and he stole away the following night, heading towards the moantians to hatch his evil plot - to get rid of Spyro.

With him out of the way, Avalar (and the realms beyond that) will all be his. But right now, he just had to figure out a way to get rid of the purple-brate.

A sudden gust of wind entered the cave, blowing paper everywhere. One paper happened to fly directly in Red's face. He clawed it away and his eye was caught by what was written on it. "Weight gain spell" it said.

After reading the unstructions, Red smiled evily. "This will do nicely," he said in a sinister tone. The spell was simple; all Red needed was a bowl of water and some liquified red and green gems.

Doing as the instructions bid him, he fetched a bowl, filled it with water, and placed it on a stone table. Looking ito one of his bags, Red founded a full bottel of green juice crystals. But when he founded the red juice, it was...

Make your choice (1): A full bottle. Spyro starts gaining weight for no reason.

Make your choice (2): A half bottle. Spyro experiences extreame hunger.
11111.title: Revenge is coming.

11112.content: Choice: Being a fan of Barbeque and Roasted Sheep, the little dragon has eaten his share of sheep. So much, in fact that he is starting to pack on the pounds quite a bit. Is he not able to control his eating habits?
11112.title: Choose another story.

115.content: It seems that you are not satisfied with the previous choices. So, let's begin with a set of new characters!
115.title: More

1153.content: Still not satisfied? How about these, instead?
1153.title: More?

choices: There is still few more to choose
11533.content: How about Elora the Faun?
11533.title: More to choose

115331.content:
So the sassy Faun from Avalar. Now the timeline. Does Elora gain weight with Spyro (or by herself if you wish) during the events of Ripto's rage or after it?

Scenario 1. Seeing how tiny Spyro is once he arrives Elora cooks up a plan to make Spyro gain weight to match the largest minions of Ripto and also getting fat by herself after finding she and Spyro getting well along.

Scenario 2. Elora misses Spyro and has gained weight by finding comfort in eating until she decides to visit Spyro in Dragon Realms or Spyro comes to visit up Elora in Avalar leading up both of them gaining weight.
115331.title: I'm a Faun you dork!

choices: Elora goes to see Professor wanting to travel to Dragon Realms to find Spyro.
Spyro is in Avalar! He came to see Elora.
1153312.content:
Elora was having a lunch in Summer Forest, it's been a while since she saw Spyro. She is not going to lie that charming snarky heroic dragon made impression to her when he kicked Ripto's and his goons butts and then watching fireworks with Spyro after defeat of the Sorceress in Forgotten Realms, but after that Spyro has spent time back in his home Dragon Realms.

The time spent without Spyro running around has left Elora longing for company. Of course she had Zoe to talk with and other Avalar folks but Spyro was something else to her. Elora started to eat to pass time and get her mind off the purple dragon and she have softened up a bit starting to develop small pot belly, thicker thighs, wider hips, bigger bust and bottom. Elora was pondering as she ate her lunch which consisted from grill food from Idol Springs, sighing softly.

"Spyro... when you are coming back?" Elora looked down to her hooves. She could go in Dragon Realms like Hunter did but, she has to keep order around Avalar and finding Spyro would be another thing in world that is unknown to her. Elora finished up her eating and got up her body wobbling a bit in her green dress.

"That's it. I'm going to ask Professor to find Spyro again." Elora put her hands onto her brown furred hips and prepared to walk away until.
1153312.title: It's a bit lonely

choices: On the way to eat Spyro starts getting more attracted to Elora's weight.
Spyro and Elora ventures off to Glimmer to have their meal.
11533122.content:
"Hey Elora!"

"Huh?" Elora turned around and saw Spyro gliding down landing before Elora and he huffed? Spyro is rarely exhausted but he was. Elora immediattly noticed something was different in Spyro too. He looked more chunkier.

Spyro formely known as sleek and agile little dragon was more rounded and wider. His face too was more fuller as if he was constantly having something in his mouth.

"Spyro? You came to see me?" Elora looked over Spyro not sure how to react to his new weight but Spyro too noticed new weight of Elora.

"I promised didn't I? And since things are quiet now in Dragon and Forgotten Realms I had time to sit back and relax!" Spyro nodded to Elora.

"Ye-yes of course! It's good to have you back." Elora offered sweet smile putting her hands behind her back. "I see you have taken the relaxing a bit too well." Elora tried to nicely mention purple dragon being thicker. "Nah.. just tiny bump on the road! I can get rid of this chub easily!" Spyro boasted pushing out his swollen chest.

Elora was starting to relax with Spyro she started to find his newfound flab rather attracting. And it seems Spyro too appreciated new flab of Elora.

Both Elora and Spyro's bellies started to growl which made Elora to blush and Spyro to poke his own gut. "Hey I ate just while ago. Sheesh."

"Mind to join me for a quick snack Spyro? We could then catch up things a bit." Elora offered sweet smile and Spyro couldn't resist after all he came to Avalar to see his friend.

"Sure thing Elora! I'm sure you know some good food to eat huh?" Spyro offered a bit snarky comment to get back at Elora about mentioning their weight.

Elora blushed tugging down her green dress to hide her swollen butt. "Ehrm.. yes." she bit her lip in shame, hoping Spyro would like her fat too.
11533122.title: Its Spyro! But something is different in him.

choices: Elora speaks out about her feelings to Spyro
Fattening heroes are in for a trouble Ripto returns for revenge!
115331221.content:
Spyro couldn't help but notice further Elora's recent gaining as he was walking behind her, the brown furred butt cheeks swaying side to side with gentle jiggle as the dress did poor job covering them.

"Hey uhm Elora? Just wanted to say, its very good to see you after things quieted down with Ripto and Sorceress." Spyro tried to open conversation while pudgy faun looked behind her.

"I appreciate the peace. Spyro your heroics here in Avalar will not be forgotten, we made sure of it by writing it in our Codex!" Elora beamed up a smile.

"Ehhh that was nothing! Ripto didn't stand a chance against me!" Spyro boastful hero as he is was getting more mood. He kept eyeing Elora's behind until they made to Idol Springs to get some tasty grill food from there.

"Let me offer you this lunch Spyro, you done so much for us." Elora ordered big plate of kebab sticks, sausages and as dessert marshmallows.

"Great! Alll that walking and stuff made me super hungry!" Spyro started hogging up great deal of the food but so did Elora, both dragon and Faun were having wonderful feast and both of them in their minds were thinking how good they looked as fat.

Elora was thinking Spyro with huge gut and behind, and his adorable fat face with big cheeks and double chin, while Spyro was imagining how Elora looked if she got big enough to rip her dress!

As they kept eating Elora's gut was pushing further straining her leaf dress and her bust started to escape the top, her buttcheeks started to peek further and further underneath the hem of her dress giving her cushion to sit on.

Spyro's gut started to swell out further reaching closer and closer to the ground, his hind started to swell looking that he had big purple buttcheeks along thickened tail, his limbs too swell up with fat along his face becoming more fuller.
115331221.title: Chubby chaser dragon who is quite big himself too

choices: Follow up Spyro and Elora struggling with and having fun with their weight
See what Ripto is planning for the faun and dragon
1153312212.content:
"Raaaagh! Crunch! Gulp! Get here right now!" a familiar voice screamed within a newfound realm gate hidden in Autumn castle.
Six heavy stomp like steps are heard behind tiny cape wearing reptile who turned around from his scrying orb showing Elora and Spyro laughing and eating.
Ripto looked over his restored dimwit minions. "Just when I'm hatching a diablotical plan over Conquering Avalar that annoying purple dragon has to come back!"
Ripto was furious staring through the orb at the slowly bulging dragon and faun. "Tell me... how I will fulfill my plan now with these two around!?!" Ripto yelled at his minions. Crunch scratched his head while Gulp let out a belch. "Raaaagrh you two imbesiles! Can't you just?! Waiit.." Ripto hissed perking his brow at Gulp and then examining the orb with less rage Ripto started to cackle. "Meheheee Gulp you are genius. With these two fatties eating their fill of the food they can't stop me if they are too big to move! And then Gulp you get a rewarding meal from your brain work." Ripto sneered rubbing his hands together as he stared back into orb. "Hehehee beware dragon and faun! Avalar will be mine, when you two can't even get your butts of the floor! I shall think a new plan in no time! Bahahahaaaaa!" Ripto laughed in very comically evil way while his two dumb minions joined the laughter while not entirely sure what their boss was laughing at.

"Urp! Man now that was such good feast Elora!" Spyro let out a belch patting his bulging fatter stomach with his hand.
"Haha happy to give you something good since your visits to Avalar has been very short timed. Not having proper chances to meet up for anything fun." Elora smiled her face has gotten fuller thanks to eating and her dress was riding up to give room for her bulging belly but equally strained thanks to her larger bust.

Spyro rolled back on his feet frowing as he felt his stomach scraping the grassy ground but seeign Elora made him to forget about it, thicker faun stood up on her hooves to have her butt jiggle along the belly, her breasts in the leaf top bounced a lot threatning to tear the leaf top apart.

"So what shall we do next? "Dork"." Elora seemingly gotten much more relaxed around Spyro with her new weight smirked at Spyro.

"Very funny Elora." Spyro gave cheeky grin back at faun.
1153312212.title: Behind the scrying orb

12.content: The first reboot of the Spyro the dragon series. Which character do we follow?
12.title: The Legend of Spyro

121.content:
And here we are, the Star Of The Show. But what short of transformation awaits Spyro, the Legendary Purple Dragon, in this story.

Choice number one: before the wretched Malefor was finally defeated, he cried out in a strange language that both Spyro nor Cynder could understood. That was quite a pity because that particular curse would have disastrous effects on Spyro's body. (Weight gain)

Choice number two: a terrible accident with a spell left Spyro burping and farting excessively. Now Cynder and Sparx must travel to a nearby mountain to obtain a special herb to save Spyro before he inflates like a balloon and explode! (Inflation)

Choice number three: a mysterious bacteria funds its way into the Warfang's drinking water. This strange organism effects only males, and causes them to swell up in strange ways. (Muscle growth or macro growth)
121.title: Spyro

122.content:
Cynder, the other purple dragon who used to be cursed by Malifor, but is soon freed by Spyro and became his love interest. Choose your story.

Choice 1 (weight gain): The war ended. Peace has been restored. With little to do, Cynder goes exploring down in the Warfang Ruins and finds a mysterious gem. Fancying its beauty, Cynder takes it for her own. Little does she know that this gem can cause some strange weight issues. Everything from extreme hunger to sudden fattening.

Choic 2 (inflation): Strange spells can do strange things. When Cynder searches the Warfang library, she stombles apon a scroll full of spells.

Choice 3 (transformation): Discovering some dark gems inside a cave, Cynder trys to absorb its magic.
122.title: Cynder

1221.content: Do you really want to stick with this story or choose another story?
1221.title: Fattening gem.

12211.content:
The Warfang ruins was the last place I would expect myself to visit, but here I am, amungst crumbeling infrastructure. I had little idea why I was down there. Mabey it was because Spyro was.

You see, the Gaurdians have been sending him to numarous temples around the realm, appearently searching for other other elemental dragons. The Gaurdians believe that if they find other dragons skilled in their elements, they can replace them and re-unite the ones broken Gaurdian thatchery.

But unfortunatly left poor-little-old-me behind. I would've given anything to go with, but due to my ones dark and violent past, the Gaurdians refused, saying I would only causs sesspetion and trouble.

As much as that was true, I felt usless. Sparx went along, as usaul, meaning i'm at least free from his tauntings. But still, I missed him. I missed his warm body next to mine. I missed his sweet kisses.

Sighing, I proceeded to trot down the pathway, if you could call it that. I honestly expected this place to be full of dangerous life, but it was as dead as a graveyard.

There was little interesting things down here, so I...'wait. What's that?' Something caught my eye. It was sighning brightly, hidden away under some rock. I walked towards the where the object was. Lifting the rock I found a strange looking gem under.

It was like nothing I ever saw in my life. It was white, but suddenly changed color to a bright green. I was in complete awe. The crystal was attached to a golden chain that glitterd in the bits of sunlight shinning through the roof of the cavern.

Too beautiful to just leave it there, I diceded to to throwit around my neck. And it is to this very day that I regret of founding and wearing that accursed thing.
12211.title: Stick with this story.

122111.content:
The chain was mesmerisingly beautiful, far to gorgeous to be left in that dirty, crumbling ruins. I adopted the jewelery, hooking it around my neck. Suddenly, out of seemingly nowhere, a alien feeling ran throughout my body. I could not simply identify it, for it left so fast as it came.

A image flashed before my eyes, too. This I could identify to a extent; it looked like like some sort of black blob-like creature, food residue covering its sets of chins, but that was all.

A shook both the weird feeling and the grotesque image from my mind and decided I had enough of the crumbling wreck of a place.

Souring through the air back towards the temple which I resided in, I felt my stomach growling, begging for food. This was odd, seeing that I ate a mere hour ago.

In the temple's mess hall - a favourite place where all old and young dragons came to have breakfast, dinner, and lunch - I went to receive yet again a hunk of meat I ate this morning, and the mole chiefs gave me the food, but not before eying me curiously. It was unusual for me to get a second helping, after all.

I never fancied large crowds, like the one in the mess hall at that moment, especially the when Spyro was not around with me, and decided to go eat inside my room.

On my balcony, overlooking the city, I ate my food in peace. But when I was finished with my food I felt...
122111.title: The hunger begins. (Slob)

choices: Spyro has returned and embraces his lover
Weight seams to have grown alarmingly so
122112.content:
I had searched some more with this... Jewelry, if you can even call it Jewelry, around my neck before I'd decided to head back home. I didn't find much more than the gem and lots of ruins. Emphasis on the word 'ruins'. There was rubble and broken bridges and such everywhere. Homes and other buildings had become unrecognizable in their state. However, something felt strange from time to time, I can't even explain the feeling now. I wrote it off as nothing, which turned out to be a huge mistake on my part. Flying up felt a bit sluggish, as I had always been thin and quick.

Speaking of being thin, Sparx would sometimes annoy me about how thin I had been. It always reminded me of my past under Malefor's cruel reign, and it made me feel embarrassed about myself. Spyro had expressed his concerns about how thin, how hungry I looked. To be fair, my eating habits were similar to those of dragons suffering from mild anorexia. It didn't take a lot to see some of my ribs and I was usually hungrier than I let off, primarily because everyone around me had gotten used to my troubling habits.

How things have changed since then, thanks to that... Necklace. I had returned to an empty home, as was the usual for the time. I felt very sluggish and tired, and I crashed as soon as I laid down in bed.

Soon after I had woken up, I felt just as tired as when I fell asleep, which I almost never had happen to me. I went to look at myself in the mirror and I was shocked to see my own reflection. The transformations that occurred on my body were mild, but noticeable. I looked tired, very tired. I seemed a bit taller, longer, and wider. I also looked like I was a healthy weight. It was exciting but also frightening.

I felt conflicted. A part of me was telling me to find the source of my gain and solve it. However, most of me was saying not to worry about it, that this was how things were supposed to be. I wanted to take a walk, but I felt too tired to actually do so. Soon after I get back to bed and lay down for a while, my thoughts telling me to do something, before I take a short nap. I awake to find...
122112.title: The sudden weight gain begins.

choices: Spyro helped me remove the necklace.
Spyro persuaded me to keep wearing it.
1221121.content:
Now, like I have mentioned earlier, Spyro was away on a task set by the guardians. Either I slept for a whole week or he decided to come home early, because when I woke up I found myself wrapped up in my mate's orange wings like a mother chicken protecting her eggs. His one paw cradled my back while the other rested on my larger butt, causing me to blush.

I was still feeling tired (though it was less), and I began to nudge Spyro awake. He stirred in his sleep, his eyes fluttering open. He blinked a few times before a bright smile crept across his face.

"Morning, beautiful," he said in a casual tone, squeezing my ass.

I blushed harder. "Spyro, when did you get back?"

"An hour ago."

"Spyro, you gotta help me. There's this gem around my neck. It's making me fatter and fatter."

"This thing?" he asked, fondling the crystal.

"Yes."

What happens next?
1221121.title: Spyro has returned and embraces his lover

1221122.content:
When I woke, I felt bloated, like I over-ate at some large buffet. I tried to rise, but felt an uncomfortable amount of weight press on my body. A frightening feeling came over me when. I gathered all my strength and shot up from my cushions, staggering when I was finally on my feet.

Rubbing the blur from my eyes, I took a moment to view whatever it was that was dragging me downwards, but then I almost screamed in horror.

My ones thin body had grown pudgy while I slept. I quickly waddled towards a mirror to assist the damage that was further inflicted on my body.

I was provided by an image that was almost unrecognizable; the dragon staring back at me had moon-shaped face, supported by a two sets of round, chubby cheeks. My neck was much thicker, but no extra chins had sprouted yet. I turned to my side and beholded my my fat belly, curving outwards towards the floor. My rear was the last sight to go through my inspection. Like the rest of my body, it had fatten up too. It practically juggled with every step I took.

I stood back, gaping in awe and shock. I just magically fattened up out of nowhere. I felt warm tears cone to my eyes as I began to panic. What would everyone think when they saw me? But more importantly, what would Spyro think if he saw me?

I had to fix this. But how was I going to do that? I quickly worked all my plans to the letter Z, but then a strange sensation started to send jolts through my body. With a loud stretching sound, my body grew...
1221122.title: Weight seams to have grown alarmingly so

12212.content: A curse left behind by Malefor takes hold of the black dragoness in a rather swelling way.
12212.title: Choose another story.

123.content:
Aah, yes, the slightly annoying but funny dragonfly. How will Spyro's foster brother expand?

Choice 1: Some times the bad things you do to others will eventually come biting you in the ass after wards. Such was the case of Sparx who. After teasing Spyro about his weight, Sparx experiences strange weight gain from nowhere! Perhaps it has something to do with Spyro's drastic weight loss?

Choice 2: After Spyro, Cynder, and Sparx stumble on some strange crystals in Avalar, Sparx (along with the others) experiences some strange strength increase.

Choice 3: Sparx stumbles on a river that has some strange transforming effects.
123.title: Sparx

124.content: You chose to follow the golden-haired, anthropomorphic cheetah. But what kind of transformation awaits this character.
124.title: Hunter

125.content: Do you wish for a OC, or do you want more choices.
125.title: Own OC

12521.content:
"I believe that would be enough for one day, young dragon," Ignitus said, looking up to the horison, observingthe big red ball of fire floating in the sky.

Spyro breathed heavely. Sorrounding him where charred dummies, burned by the little purple dragon's fire. "Come along, now." Ignitus whirled and headed on the path back towards the temple, Spyro trotting obiediantly after him.

It was all ready twilight when the two arrived home. The gaurdians where making ready to go to bed when Ignitus arrived. He lied down and allowed sleep to take him.

The following morning, Ignitus felt...
12521.title: Ignitus.

choices: When Ignitus awoke again, he felt even more bloated.
When Ignitus woke, he found the guardians all staring at him in disgust.
125212.content:
Ignitus was awoken, not by the usual way of the sun hitting his eyelids, but by the loud gurgle of his stomach. As Ignitus raised, he felt bloated, like there was something trapped inside his body that demanded to be released. It was then, when the fire dragon finally came out of his sleepy state, that he realised that this uncomfortable bloated feeling was that of gas contained in his body.

Ignitus blushed, knowing what had to be done. He looked at his surroundings: the rest of the Guardians where all sleeping peacefully, and the room was still dark, indicating that the sun had not rose yet.

As quietly as possible, Ignitus slipped out of the main entrance and headed off to a remote area in the temple, his stomach making harsh gurgling sounds all the way. Ones there, Ignitus looked left and right, making 100 percent sure that no one hade followed him.

When he was sure that his presence was the only thing in that part of the temple, Ignitus simply 'let it rip'. A huge fart exploded from the fire dragon's rear, causing him to blush wildly. He felt like some sort of pig to fart so loudly. It even worried him that he might be sick.

Ignitus vanned the air with his paw, and walked back towards the Guardians' chamber, feeling much lighter then he did before.

Ignitus lied himself down and drifted off into sleep.
125212.title: Bloated.

choices: Yes; Ignitus' stomach begins to inflate.
No; Volteer does his examinations in peace.
1252121.content:
When Ignitus woke again, he found the room empty and the sun had already risen a long time ago. But there was something else that caught the fire guardian's attention very quickly; the furious rumble of his stomach and a bloated feeling that felt even worse then before.

Ignitus rose, letting loose a small fart as he did so, and rubbed his stomach. Suddenly, catching the guardian by complete surprise, Ignitus belch so loudly that it echoed off the temple's walls.

"By the Ancestors!" he exclaimed. "What the hell is wrong with me?"

Ignitus, deciding that he was indeed sick - probably something he ate - , and left to consult Volteer about his sickness. He was lucky that it was Terrador's turn to teach Spyro his earth element today, or it would have been catastrophic day for the guardian indeed.

Ignitus found Volteer in is study, where he usually was when he was not training Spyro, busy cooking up a batch of strange multi-colored potions.

Ignitus stepped into Volteer's study, and was greeted warmly by the Guardian of Electricity; "Ignitus, my old friend! What brings you to my to study?"

Ignitus smiled in greeting too, trying his best to ignore the bloated feeling inside his body. "A sickness, Volteer; I haven't been feeling well lately."

Volteer looked at Ignitus with genuine concern. "Well then, sit down my friend and tell me all about the symptoms of your mysterious disease."

Ignitus did so, finding a cushion and sitting down on it, his belly protesting loudly about being moved so much.

Volteer eyed The fire guardian's gut, and said: "Sounds to me like a case of a intestinal bug."

He leaned over, studying his stomach. But does anything happen then?
1252121.title: When Ignitus awoke again, he felt even more blo...

12523.content: More you ask? What about this character?
12523.title: More?

125231.content: What sort of transformation awaits this red dragon?
125231.title: Flame.

125232.content: What about the pink dragon essential Ember?
125232.title: Still no?

1252321.content: You chose the pink drogoness Ember. What will happen to her?
1252321.title: Yes?

12523211.content:
Flame looked at Ember with an expression consisting of shock, surprise, disguse, and interest as the pink dragoness stuffed her face with whatever her greedy paws could grab ahold of. He was well aware of the eyes that stared at the the four dragons' table, drawn by the sound of the dragoness gorging her morning meal, so he said: "Slow down, girl."

Ember stopped and looked at him with a face that said 'Why should I?'. "Ember, are you sure that you're okay?" a black drogoness, known as Cynder, asked.

Ember gulped. "Why is everyone asking me that? I'm perfectly fine. I'm just hungry, that's all," she said, making for a roasted chicken wing.

"I beg to differ," Sparx said, who was floating above his brother's head with folded arm, "You're eating the whole entire food storage of the temple," he finished by spreading out his arms.

For ones Sparx's brother, a purple dragon, had to, though far less exaggerate, agree with his golden brother. Ember was consuming far more food than any dragon her age could possibly handle, and she wasn't showing any signs of stpping soon. So far she managed to eat an entire sheep, three roasted chicken, and now she was busy with fourth.

The group exchanged whispers amungst each other, investing theories why this dragoness had such a monstrous appetite all the sudden. The best conclusion they could come across was that she was suffering from some sort of unknown illness. "Probably worms," Sparx suggested with a grin to Spyro, earning him a sharp glare from the purple dragon.

Though the idea didn't seem so implausible...
12523211.title: Weight gain?

choices: Her weight dramatically increases over time.
Spyro and  Cynder discover what"s wrong with Ember.
125232112.content:
A week had past since the event of the strange breakfast, but in those days things did not get any less peculiar: Ember's hunger seemed to increase with every meal she ate, her food portions piling up until she was eating the equivalent of a full-grown male dragon.

And, of course, this showed on her figure quite visibly: she was developing pudge all over her body, her rear, belly, limbs, and face becoming round and soft.

All her friends were deeply concerned about this, all except Flame. The red dragon found, for some unknown reason, that he was attracted to this. He watched Ember as she ate, feeling the strange urge to feed her, play with her growing belly and developing lovehandles, to kiss her on her soft cheeks. Flame never voiced this out loud, for the fear of being ridiculed.

But on one day, when they were alone in his room, the red dragon could not handle the temptation anymore. He decided to come clean, to reveal what he thought about this situation.

Ember was busy nibbling on mango, reclined on a pair of cushions with Flame, her chubby body pressed close to the reed dragon, watching the sun set over the walls of Warfang.

"Ember," Flame suddenly said, breaking the peaceful silence, "Can I ask you something?"

"Go ahead," the pink dragoness said, resting her head on his neck.

"You've been eating a lot lately and..." Flame trailed off, embarrassment catching his words.

Ember rolled her eyes. She knew what was coming next. Yet another lecture of how she should watch what she's eating and the amount of weight she was gaining because of her unhealthy diet. Ember had heard this from Cynder, Spyro, and even the guardians! What was their problem? Can't she eat a little more than usual? She was not gaining that much weight, was she?

But what Flame sad next caught her by surprise. "And I was thinking of helping you gain weight and feeding you," said Flame.

Ember pulled her neck away from her lover and stared at Flame with surprise. "Really?" asked Ember, "You mean that you like me fat?"

Flame rubbed the back of his head, saying: "Yeah, I do."

Ember smiled. She could use this to her advantage.

"Well, I'm glad someone excepts my lifestyle," she said, giving the dragon a kiss.
125232112.title: Ember's helper.

13.content: The second reboot to the Spyro series. Now, which Skylander do we follow?
13.title: Skylanders

13533.content: Perhaps a villian? Skylands isn't only filled with Skylanders.
13533.title: Other

135331.content: Let's begin with the most noticeable one: Kaos.
135331.title: Villan time!

135332.content: How about the Skylands habitants instead?
135332.title: No.

1353321.content: Let's see, what about Flynn, that very vain and cocky balloonist.
1353321.title: Yes.

14.content: This is the OC option. Here, you can create your own character. Be sure to include the usual info on the character!
14.title: Your own OC

141.content:
Name: Kas.
Element: dark-fire and other magic.
Age: 18 years.
Race: black dragon.
Universe: Legend of Spyro.

Personality: calm but cold, Kas is a brave dragon that takes little joy in fighting. He harbors a certain dark air around him, and can be creepy and selfish sometimes. Kas would rather enjoy the company of a good book over friends, leading him to have a lonely life that doesn't bother him at all. although he has dark character traits, Kas is curious, causing him to stumble upon strange situations.

Appearance: Kas has a sleek body. His scales are midnight-black, granting him stealth in the darkness, and has a dark-green underbelly and wing membranes. A normal creature has white surrounding their irises, but Kas has black surrounding his ominous red eyes. He has two horns that zigzag in the air, and two more that sprouts from his cheeks..

Info: born from a family of six, Kas was considered to be the runt of the litter. When the war began Kas' brothers left, leaving him behind with his semi-abusive uncle. But he wasn't about to stand being left behind while his other brothers lived the life of adventure. He escaped at the age of 15 years, and spend the time of the war behind the walls of Warfang, defending it from attackers. But now the war was over, and Kas founded himself with two options - go back home or stay in the city. He chose to stay, working in a school assisting teacher

Now, with this info, what expansions await this dragon?.
141.title: Free Choice

1412.content: Growing envious of other dragons' hulking forms, Kas decides to use unique magical powers to leech of any muscular dragon.
1412.title: Muscle growth.

14121.content:
Kas had not the faintest clue why he was doing this, why he was searching through dusty old books at the library for one particular spell. The black dragon was never very skillful with his element, but when it came to magic he was a expert, able to cast complex spells that only elder dragons could muster.

But his weak elemental abilities was not the reason why he was here; he was here because of his body. You see, Kas had a slender figure that more belonged to a dragoness than a drake. All through the black dragon's life he had always envied other's hulking forms. Being the youngest of six, he was considered the runt of the litter. All his older siblings were well-build, characteristics the owned from their father, but he was cursed with his mother's features.

Even here in Warfang things weren't so easy: he was picked on by his peers, getting a date was impossible, and his grades at combat training with Terrador wasn't so good. The final straw happened today, when entered a pharmacy to gets some herbs for an injury, when the silly mole at the counter mistaken him for a female. Some other dragons in the shop giggled, and the humiliation was too much to bare.

Now he was here in the library. It was late, a good thing; Kas didn't want anyone to discover what he was about to do.

He finally found the spell that he was looking for, a spell that was meant for plants only, but he wanted to use it on himself. The spell could transmit organic mass from one organism to the next, making one plant whither away and the other grow. Farmer apparently used this on crops.

Kas stood ready, saying the words for the spell loud and clearly. First nothing happened, and Kas was disappointed, but suddenly a tingling feeling spread throughout his body and it began to grow a earthy green color.

The black dragon grinned. He knew very well that the spell was active on his body now, that he can leech off any muscular thing, but the question was whom? There was the legendary purple dragon Spyro, who had a good body, and the muscular red dragon known as Flame.

But Kas thought better; he knew that they would get suspicious when they saw his bodies began to dwindle and his grow.

No, he had to pick another option. There was his towering behemoth of a mentor, Terrador. Kas was sure that this resaviour of muscle wouldn't mind if a little bit of his strength is leeched away. Hell, he wouldn't even notice!

So, what's it going to be? Should he play it safe and suck the away the muscle of his mentor, or should he prey on the purple or red dragons?
14121.title: Let the leeching begin.

142.content:
Name: Mel.
Gender: Female.
Age: 17 years.
Element: Water.
Race: Water dragon.
Universe: Legend of Spyro.

Personality: Mel is a optimistic and outgoing, a dragoness who only wants to make her friends happy. Her favorite activity is, unsurprisingly, swimming. She might have a crush on Kas.

Appearance: Mel is a curvy dragoness. She has bright blue scales and a white underbelly. Her eyes are a ocean-green color, and her horns look like seashells.

Info: Mel was born and raised in the city of Warfang. She worked as a healer during the war. Now she is a casual student at the Warfang Academy. She is friends with Spyro and Cynder.

What will happen to this OC?
142.title: Free Choice

15.content: More then on character? Sounds interesting. Here's just a few options you can choose from.
15.title: Multiple characters at once

152.content: Spyro and Sparx? Alright then, what swelling tales awaits us?
152.title: Spyro and Sparx.

choices: They come apon some strange scroll.
They come apon a recipe on gaining weight.
Spyro suddenly noticed that Sparx looked wider.
1521.content:
"Come on, fatty," Sparx teased, looking back at Spyro. "Who are you calling a fatty?" Spyro shouted back. Spyro quickened his pace, trying to catch up to the yellow dragonfly.

The library stairs proved to be a obstacle for the young dragon, slowing him down. It was rather unfortunate, because that allowed Sparx to be victorious at the end.

"Well, I guess I can call you Blubberbutt from now on," Sparx said with a grin. "Yeah, yeah, you win," Spyro said in a defeated manner.

"Come on, Blubberbutt. We need to get those books for the assignment." Spyro followed Sparx as they winded down narrow pathways, books and scrolls on either sides of them.
1521.title: Weight gain.

choices: No, so Spyro and Gill Grunt, then.
No, so Hunter and Sparx, then.
155.content: Wait a freaking minute! There's still some more characters that will change together to choose from left! Would you like to stick with this option, though?
155.title: Oc and canon.

1551.content: Would you like to stick with this option or go with another one?
1551.title: No, so Spyro and Gill Grunt, then.

15512.content: How about Camo and Echo, then?
15512.title: Go with Another Option.

1551221.content:
Here we go: an endless amount of transformation can happen here.

Let's begin with with one of the best known expansions...

Weight gain!

Shall Flame and Cynder fatten up into blobs?
1551221.title: Flame and Cynder.

15512212.content: Alright then, how about they transform into some sort of animal?
15512212.title: No?

1552.content: Would you like to stick with this option or go with another one?
1552.title: No, so Hunter and Sparx, then.

15521.content:
You have chosen to stick with this option.
Hunter and Sparx is truly an odd choice, but that makes it even more interesting. So, what type of expansion does the insect and cheetah undergo?
15521.title: Stick with this Option

155212.content: More choices, eh? How about we transform the feline and insect into muscle-bound freaks?
155212.title: Muscle growth!

info.brief_description: Big changes happen to your favorite purple dragon and his wonderful friends!
info.description:
This is a Interactive Story about the Spyro the Dragon series. I've seen other Interactive Stories about Spyro before, but not like this, so I decided to make this one.

Rules:
1. Only include characters from the classic Spyro series, TLOS series, or the Skylanders series, unless if it's a transformation, but no humans.
2. Don't include stuff that might be 18+ and up.
3. No scat, water works, vomit, or diapers.

Otherwise, have fun with this Interactive Story!
info.pretty_title: Spyro the Dragon: WG, Inflation & Etc.
